Title: Prohibits the manufacture or sale of cosmetics tested on animals
Summary: Prohibits the manufacture or sale of cosmetics tested on animals; punishable by a fine of not more than five hundred dollars for the first violation and not more than one thousand dollars for each subsequent violation.
LawCode: Add ยง399-aaaa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of cosmetics tested on animals
